Title: Learn To Ride
Description: It's time for you to learn how to ride!  Seek out Randal Hunter at the Eastvale Logging Camp in Elwynn Forest.  Don't forget to buy your mount while you are there!
PortraitGiverText: Find Randal Hunter and learn how to ride a mount!
RewardText: Don't forget to buy your mount while you are here!  Katie Hunter can be found here in camp.
